resources.string: Please gave your ingame information. Your account name is needed so people can contact you ingame. The gameserver is needed to organize the data. This data can be changed afterwards in the settings screen.

Welcome to \'ESO Comm\'. This is a free \'Elder Scrolls Online\' community. With this app you can publish your guild or find the guild you are looking for. Being it a trading guild or crafting guild. Also sell/buy your precious items on a larger store then a 500 guild store.
